name: Unhitched Isles
description:
Created in 48 hours from scratch for Ludum Dare 49 - Theme: Unstable.

A wise man once asked if we should be concerned about overpopulation tipping an island over. Turns out he was right!

Try and undertake the building tasks given to you without sinking or tipping the island. If you tip it too much you will lose your buildings!

Modes: Normal (Timed tasks) and Zen (Tasks given but free to ignore them and free build)

Hardcore (and Hardcore Zen) - As above but losing ANY building will end the game.

Controls: 

A/D or arrow keys to pan the camera. Mousewheel to zoom in/out

Number keys can (should!) be used for building hotkeys. Escape brings up the in game pause menu.

(Best played fullscreen)

Inspiration

Great news! Someone has made an unofficial live action fan trailer....

Tech details:

Made in Unity.

Graphics: Blender, Gimp

Audio: Audacity and phone microphone around the house (hint: the seagull SFX isnt a bird and the ocean isnt water)
